name: SMASH! SLASH! SHOOT!
description:
A 1v1 card game where the cards you choose get played in a random order.

Two local delinquents go head to head in an all-out battle! The only problem is, these delinquents are so hot headed they just pick up a throw whatever they can get their hands on with no strategy or thought at all! It's like what they are choosing is in a completely random order!! They are out of control!!!
